translation.en: I am Bryan and you are Rufus.
translation.it: Io sono Bryan e tu sei Rufus.

translation.en: Come on. Where did you go?
[man 1] Eve, you shouldn't have done it.
You have a group of parents petitioning to have you fired now.
I know who. They've been trying to get me fired since I started.
translation.it: So chi sono. Vogliono farmi licenziare da quando ho iniziato.

translation.en: And it seems like you want them to succeed.
translation.it: Sembra quasi che tu lo voglia.

translation.en: Maine state law requires sexual education.
translation.it: La legge del Maine richiede l'educazione sessuale.

translation.en: But local boards decide which topics.
translation.it: Ma il consiglio decide i temi.

translation.en: And the topics they don't want covered, do we imagine they just disappear if we ignore them?
translation.it: E gli altri argomenti scompaiono se li ignoriamo?

translation.en: I may agree with you but when you teach topics that aren't covered by the board,
translation.it: Sono d'accordo, ma se insegni cose non concordate con il consiglio,

translation.en: you're telling them about stuff that we've decided they're too young to know about.
translation.it: gli spieghi cose che sono troppo piccoli per conoscere.

translation.en: These kids know how to Google.
And some people believe that such information will lead to them having sex.
translation.it: E alcuni credono che quelle informazioni li porteranno a fare sesso.

translation.en: But I know they will. There's a difference.
translation.it: Ma so che lo faranno. È diverso.

translation.en: Nevertheless the board has decided to place you on administrative leave.
translation.it: Ciò nonostante, il consiglio ha predisposto il tuo congedo.

translation.en: There will be an official announcement tomorrow.

translation.it: Sì, non ne era molto sorpresa.

translation.en: Even if I resign, the other schools will know why. I won't get a new job.
translation.it: Anche se mi dimettessi, non troverei lavoro in altre scuole.

translation.en: -I could go to work for the paper. -You already work too much.
translation.it: - Potrei lavorare per il giornale. - Lavori già troppo.

translation.en: Or I could go back into advertising.
translation.it: O potrei tornare a fare pubblicità.

translation.en: And how long will it be before you start hating me for that?
translation.it: E dopo quanto tempo mi odierai per questo?

translation.en: Mind giving our garden the same treatment, while we're away?
translation.it: Potresti sistemare anche il nostro giardino?

translation.en: If you take your bikes instead of the car.
translation.it: Sì, se usate la bici e non la macchina.

translation.en: You know, I saw at the library that it's the short trips that pollute the most.
translation.it: In biblioteca ho capito che i viaggi brevi inquinano di più.
- Spero tu non ci vada in auto. - Papà!

translation.en: any reason for your newfound interest in high-school football?
translation.it: c'è un motivo per il tuo rinnovato interesse per il football?

translation.en: Is it a fascination with team psychology?
translation.it: È il fascino per la psicologia di squadra?

translation.en: Or are you making a study of the athlete as a modern gladiator?
translation.it: O fai uno studio sull'atleta come moderno gladiatore?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, because I, no, I had a feeling it might have something
translation.it: Avevo la sensazione che avesse a che fare

translation.en: to do with the piercing blue eyes of Jay Heisel, super star quarterback.
translation.it: con gli occhi blu del quarterback superstar Jay Heisel.

translation.en: there's more to life than good looks.
translation.it: che la bellezza non è tutto.

translation.en: -[Kevin] Adrian meeting us there? -[Alex] If they let him.
I'm meeting Alex at the game.
translation.it: Mi vedo con Alex alla partita.

translation.en: You know your father can't hear you when you're wearing makeup.
translation.it: Tuo padre non ti ascolta quando sei truccato.

translation.en: We're just culturally biased to like it. All football is is white-male aggression.
translation.it: Hai dei pregiudizi se ami il football. Non è che violenza tra maschi bianchi.

translation.en: Three-fourths of the NFL is black.
translation.it: Nella NFL tre quarti sono neri.

translation.en: Maybe they're oppressed and this is their way out of a bankrupt education system.
translation.it: Forse sono oppressi e così fuggono da un sistema di istruzione fallito.

translation.en: Maybe you can be oppressed and still like football.
translation.it: O forse anche chi è oppresso ama il football.

translation.en: Either way I'm gonna enjoy my male privilege
Is that one of the moms that got you fired?
translation.it: È una mamma che ti ha fatta licenziare?

translation.en: -[groans] -[man 3] OK, Mia. Tell me where it is.
I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.it: Non so di cosa stai parlando.

translation.en: Rob told me I could do whatever I want to you,
translation.it: Rob mi ha detto di farti ciò che volevo.

translation.en: as long as I make you talk, huh?
Well, maybe that's why Rob is dead now.
translation.it: Forse è per questo che ora Rob è morto.

translation.en: Well, why don't you call him?
Your boy's gonna get lucky tonight.
translation.it: Oggi il tuo ragazzo avrà fortuna.

translation.en: It's not luck. He worked for it.
translation.it: Non è fortuna. Se l'è guadagnata.

translation.en: He sure can throw a ball.
translation.it: Lui sì che sa tirare un pallone.

translation.en: Yeah. Raised him to be a man.
I don't think my brother knows what a man is.
translation.it: Mio fratello non sa cos'è un uomo.

translation.en: The team wanna celebrate at Kristofferson's.
Alex is not old enough for a party.
Maybe we could have discussed it first.
you give her just another fake hook to make it painful when I say no.
translation.it: le dai false speranze ed è difficile dire di no.

translation.en: -Maybe you shouldn't say no then. -I wish you would do it, but you don't.
translation.it: - Non dovresti dirle di no. - Vorrei lo facessi tu, ma non lo fai.

translation.en: You say "maybe" and leave the dirty work to me.
translation.it: Lasci a me il compito più duro.

translation.en: She has to get out and experience life.
translation.it: Deve uscire e fare le sue esperienze.

translation.en: It's time to let her go.
She just wants what's best for you.
translation.it: Vuole solo il meglio per te.

translation.en: Do you also think this is what's best for me?
translation.it: Anche tu credi che questo sia meglio per me?

translation.en: -She loves you. -She has no idea what love is--
translation.it: - Ti vuole bene. - Non sa cosa sia l'amore.

translation.en: I remember when I first fell in love with her.
Every second I couldn't be with her killed me.
translation.it: Ogni secondo senza di lei mi uccideva.

translation.en: She doesn't understand our kind of love.
translation.it: Non capisce il nostro tipo di amore,

translation.en: Doesn't mean she loves any less.
translation.it: ma non per questo non lo prova.

translation.en: If you can get Adrian to go with you...
you can go for a couple of hours.
-Pretty nice of your dad to let you go. -Very nice of you to join me.
translation.it: Tuo padre è stato carino. Anche tu a venire con me.

translation.en: What's the point of asking permission if he won't talk to you?
translation.it: Perché chiedere il permesso se non mi parla?

translation.en: Not that I miss him calling me a freak.
I think you should just move in with us. I mean, we could adopt you.
translation.it: Dovresti venire a vivere da noi. Potremmo adottarti.

translation.en: Oh, like a little shelter puppy.
Yeah, then we could watch cheesy '80s movies every night.
translation.it: Potremmo guardare ogni sera scadenti film anni '80.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sure Kevin and Eve would love that.
translation.it: Sono certo che a Kevin e Eve piacerebbe.

translation.en: Yeah, of course they would. Mom's at least 30% less annoying when you're around.
translation.it: A loro piacerebbe. Mamma è il 30% meno seccante quando ci sei tu.

translation.en: They would love it. I'd love it.
And you are aware that pretty much all of these people are superficial assholes.
translation.it: E tu lo sai che quasi tutti questi tizi sono stronzi superficiali?

translation.en: I promise I will follow you wherever you wanna go
when you fall in love with a guy, OK?
Or a girl. I don't fall for gender. I fall for--
translation.it: O una ragazza. Non mi interessa il genere...

translation.en: That's, like, totally offensive to the local culture.
translation.it: Questo è offensivo per la cultura locale.

translation.en: I'm here to hook up with hot football jocks.
translation.it: Sono qui per rimorchiare sexy giocatori di football.

translation.en: Oh? I thought you were a bottom.
translation.it: Pensavo che a te piacesse prenderlo.

translation.en: -We're just having fun. -Doesn't look like he's having fun.
translation.it: Ci stavamo divertendo. A me non sembra.

translation.en: I'm sorry for my friends. Apparently, they forgot what century we live in.
translation.it: Scusa per i miei amici. Si dimenticano in che secolo siamo.

translation.en: I'm sorry about this. I'm gonna get you guys a drink.
translation.it: Mi spiace per tutto questo. Vi prendo un drink.

translation.en: Well, if nothing else, then just to shake off this whole experience, OK?
translation.it: Se non per altro, almeno per dimenticare tutta questa storia, ok?

translation.en: God. You're such a pussy. You know that, right?
translation.it: Sei una femminuccia. Lo sai, vero?

translation.en: -Do you want me to arrest him for you? -Fuck you.
[exhales] Something killed my dog. I-I-It killed my fucking dog.
translation.it: Qualcosa ha ucciso il mio cane, cazzo!

translation.en: A-A-And there was a... Something in the mist.
Don't tell me to calm down, OK?
translation.it: Non dirmi di stare calmo, ok?

translation.en: There was something in the mist. Do you not understand that? Something in it.
translation.it: C'era qualcosa nella nebbia. Non capite? Qualcosa nella nebbia.

translation.en: Now, can you tell us, have you done any drugs lately?
translation.it: Adesso dicci, hai preso delle droghe?

translation.en: Done any drugs, man? What the fuck?
-I'm telling you something-- -Somthing killed your dog.
translation.it: - Sto dicendo che qualcosa... - Ha ucciso il tuo cane.

translation.en: Listen, you can't spread fear like that. It disrupts the public order.
translation.it: Non puoi seminare panico così, disturbi l'ordine pubblico.

translation.en: Maybe you might wanna stay here until you sober up again.
translation.it: È meglio se resti qui finché non torni lucido.

translation.en: -Get off me! -[Pundik] Stay down. I'm telling you!
What are you doing here? Who are you?
translation.it: Che stai facendo qui? Chi sei?

translation.en: The old lady? She died two months ago.
translation.it: La vecchia? È morta due mesi fa.

translation.en: I left some things in the shed--
Her stuff is in the storage locker downtown. They couldn't find her daughter.
translation.it: La sua roba è in un deposito in città. Non hanno trovato la figlia.

translation.en: Who did you say you were?
Yeah, well, there was nothing of value in the garden shed.
translation.it: Non c'era niente di valore nel capanno.

translation.en: You want that, you'll have to take it up with the estate lawyer.
translation.it: Se li vuoi, devi rivolgerti all'avvocato.

translation.en: -Where is she? -I-I don't know. Maybe she's, uh...
translation.it: - Dov'è? - Non lo so. Forse è...

translation.en: [Eve] Sweetie, you have to tell us what happened.
translation.it: Tesoro, devi dirci cosa è successo

translation.en: We can't help you unless you tell us.
The last thing I remember is someone helping me upstairs.
translation.it: L'ultima cosa che ricordo è che mi aiutavano a salire le scale.

translation.en: [Kevin] Alex, I told you not to drink.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di non bere.

translation.en: [Kevin] I told her she could go.
-[Eve] What are you talking about? -[Kevin] I said she could go with Adrian.
translation.it: - Che dici? - Ma soltanto se portava Adrian con sé.

translation.en: -[Eve] Who allowed you to do that? -[Kevin] I allowed it.
translation.it: - Chi ti ha dato il permesso? - Io.

translation.en: [Eve] It's OK, sweetie. You're home now. That's what matters.
translation.it: Ok, ora sei a casa. Questo è l'importante.

translation.en: I could feel what had happened.
There was blood on the sheets.
I'm sorry. I shouldn't have gone.
[sniffles] This can never be your fault.
translation.it: Non potrebbe mai essere colpa tua.
Adrian sa che cosa è successo.

translation.en: We have to take her to the police.

translation.it: - Eve... - Hai agito alle mie spalle.

translation.en: Yes, because you... You're keeping her locked up.
translation.it: Sì, perché tu la tieni sempre rinchiusa.

translation.en: We have to be there for her.
Well, it looks like you have calmed down a bit.
translation.it: Sembra che ti sia calmato un po'.

translation.en: Why don't you tell me who you are? I'll file the report. We can all go home.
translation.it: Dimmi chi sei. Compilo il verbale e andiamo tutti casa.

translation.en: Look, please, just listen to me.
Hey, hey! No! You can't do that!
Oh, yeah? You can remember the law, huh?
translation.it: Sì? La legge te la ricordi, però.

translation.en: Well, it looks like we are calling Arrowhead,
and you are staying a while longer.
translation.it: e tu starai dentro un altro po'.

translation.en: What can I do for you?
Maybe it's best we speak to someone else.
We need you to come with us.
-Why? What's going on? -Just please come with us.
translation.it: - Perché? Che succede? - Per favore, vieni con noi.

translation.en: Is it something with my dad?
We just need you to come down to the station and answer a few questions.
translation.it: Devi venire in centrale e rispondere a delle domande.

translation.en: You're being investigated for sexual assault.
The police had a few more questions for her and then you can go home.
translation.it: Dopo qualche altra domanda potrete andare.

translation.en: She should see a therapist as soon as possible.
From you she needs stability, safety.
-Kevin, I can't say anything-- -I need to know.
translation.it: - Kevin, non posso dire niente. - Io devo sapere.

translation.en: [sighs] There are signs of intercourse, but no violence.
translation.it: Ci sono segni di un rapporto sessuale, non di violenza.

translation.en: There are also traces of Triazolam in her blood.
translation.it: Ci sono anche tracce di Triazolam nel suo sangue.

translation.en: -What about the DNA? Can't you-- -We took one.
translation.it: - E il DNA? - Abbiamo preso un campione.

translation.en: And that will show who, but not that it was rape.
translation.it: Ci dirà chi è stato, non se è stupro.

translation.en: I don't know what to do.
You already went to the police.
-You don't have to do anything-- -No, I don't know what to do.
translation.it: - Non devi fare altro. - No, io non so che cosa fare.

translation.en: I can't watch TV. I can't read.
translation.it: Non riesco a guardare la TV né a leggere.

translation.en: I wanted to listen to some music and I had to pick a song,
translation.it: Volevo sentire la musica, ma scegliendo,

translation.en: and I was, like, the song I pick,
it will always be the first song I heard after...
Hm, we can choose a really bad song.
translation.it: Possiamo scegliere un pezzo molto brutto.

translation.en: Like a stupid Katy Perry song, or something.
translation.it: Una stupida canzone di Katy Perry o una cosa del genere.

translation.en: That way you won't ruin a good song.
translation.it: Così non ne rovini una bella.

translation.en: I like Katy Perry. You hate her.
translation.it: A me lei piace, sei tu che la odi.

translation.en: You can't let them win, you know?
You know how this is gonna go.
They will say you're a liar.
I shouldn't have gone behind your back.
Do you have any idea what it's like having been bad cop for 16 years?
translation.it: Hai un'idea di come sia aver fatto il poliziotto cattivo per 16 anni?
Sedici anni in cui dico di no?

translation.en: 16 years of a daughter who loves you and who hates...?
translation.it: Sedici anni con una figlia che ama te e odia...

translation.en: [Connor] If they haven't pressed charges, the case is weak.
translation.it: Senza una denuncia, il caso non sta in piedi.

translation.en: And Ron... Ron's a good lawyer.
translation.it: E Ron è un buon avvocato.

translation.en: You just... You do what he says.
translation.it: Devi solo fare come ti dice.

translation.en: Follow his lead and be honest with him.
translation.it: Fatti guidare e sii sincero con lui.

translation.en: You can tell him anything, but you can't repeat it, right?
translation.it: Puoi dirgli tutto, ma non dirlo in giro.

translation.en: Why do you talk to me as if I did it?
I thought I told you to get out of here.
You got no business being here.
Hey, I'm not here to hurt you.
Are you afraid of the cops?
You should have thought of that before you tried to steal whatever this is.
translation.it: Dovevi pensarci prima di rubare qualunque cosa sia questa.

translation.en: There was something in the mist. I-I-It's on its way.
translation.it: C'era qualcosa nella nebbia. Sta arrivando.

translation.en: Alex is not safe here. We're staying at my sister's.
translation.it: Alex non è al sicuro. Andremo da mia sorella.

translation.en: I'll find a therapist in St. Vincent.
translation.it: Troverò uno psicologo a St. Vincent.

translation.en: And Dr. Sing phoned in a prescription for Valium. I'll pick it up.
translation.it: Il dr. Sing mi ha prescritto il Valium per telefono. Lo prendo io.

translation.en: It was a party. There's no way I could have known.
translation.it: Era una festa. Non avrei potuto immaginarlo.

translation.en: But I could, which is why I said no.
translation.it: Ma io sì, ecco perché le ho detto di no.

translation.en: Because I've spent my entire life around guys like Jay.
translation.it: Perché ho passato tutta la vita dietro a ragazzi come Jay.

translation.en: I can't be with you right now, OK?
translation.it: Ora non posso stare con te, ok?

translation.en: Come up in a few days. Then we'll talk.
You should get the window fixed,
and then go to the police with the harassment.
translation.it: e andare alla polizia per la denuncia.

translation.en: [Benedict] I thought we'd agreed you'd stop looking for conspiracy theories on the internet.
translation.it: Eravamo d'accordo che dovevi smettere di cercare teorie del complotto su Internet.

translation.en: You know Dr. Kleerick says it's not good for you.
translation.it: Per il dr. Kleerick non ti fa bene.

translation.en: This is not the internet, it's the Bridgeville Post. I'm fine.
translation.it: Questo non è Internet, è il Bridgeville Post. Sto bene.

translation.en: Now go back to your comics.
"Six people were found dead. Presumably killed by a bear."
translation.it: "Sei persone trovate morte. Forse uccise da un orso."

translation.en: "Other animals came down the mountain in large numbers,
including moose and deer and foxes."
[Nathalie] "Some locals fear it's a Black Spring...
a legend of nature turning sour,
translation.it: Una leggenda secondo cui la natura marcisce,

translation.en: as evidenced by the frozen lake being black like a rotten tooth."
translation.it: dimostrata dal lago ghiacciato divenuto nero come un dente cariato."

translation.en: The Bridgeville Post sure ain't what it used to be.
translation.it: Il Bridgeville Post non è più come un tempo.

translation.en: -[sighs] What do you want? -Maybe I should speak to Officer Pundik.
translation.it: - Che cosa vuoi? - Parlare con l'agente Pundik.

translation.en: Pundik is picking up Adrian for questioning.
translation.it: Pundik è andato a prendere Adrian per interrogarlo.

translation.en: Are you OK to talk to me? Or you can wait until Pundik's done.
translation.it: Ti va di parlare con me o vuoi aspettare Pundik?

translation.en: I'm sorry. I know this isn't what you want.
translation.it: So che non è quello che vuoi.

translation.en: But it's for the best. The way things are right now.
translation.it: Ma è meglio così, per come stanno le cose ora.

translation.en: Everything I do, I do to protect you.
translation.it: Tutto quello che faccio è per proteggerti.

translation.en: You're not protecting me, you're controlling me.
translation.it: Tu non mi proteggi, tu mi controlli.

translation.en: Please! You just don't want me to do what you did.
translation.it: Ti prego! Vuoi solo che io non faccia quello che hai fatto tu.

translation.en: But guess what? I won't 'cause I'm nothing like you.
translation.it: Ma non lo farò perché non sono come te.

translation.en: You're embarrassing yourself at school, and...
What do you mean do what I did?
-What do you mean? -You said it yourself. It's a small town.
translation.it: - Cosa intendi? - L'hai detto tu. È una piccola città.

translation.en: I'm gonna go pick up the Valium.
Do you wanna come, or do you wanna wait here?
-[Connor] It's amazing. -[Kevin] It's moving against the wind.
Dad, will you please come with us? I don't wanna go with Mom.
translation.it: Papà, vieni con noi? Non voglio andare con la mamma.

translation.en: I'll be there soon, honey. You'll be fine. Where's Mom?
translation.it: Verrò presto, tesoro. Starai bene. Dov'è la mamma?

translation.en: We're at the mall. Dad, please. I don't wanna leave.
translation.it: Siamo al centro commerciale. Papà, ti prego.

translation.en: It will blow over in a minute.
No, just... just wait. Just wait.
I wanna get, uh, a photo for the missus.
translation.it: Faccio una foto per mia moglie.

translation.en: Great. You do that, Pundik. We'll see you inside.
translation.it: Va bene. Fallo, Pundik. Ci vediamo dentro.

translation.en: OK, get in the car. We gotta go.
-What is it? What's going on? -Come on! Let's go!
translation.it: - Che c'è? Che succede? - Dai, andiamo!

translation.en: Shall we wait till it's gone?
[Nathalie] It's like that time at the inn up by Chocolate Lake.
translation.it: È come quella volta alla pensione a Chocolate Lake.

translation.en: Oh... no. Wrong, wrong... wrong direction.
These trees were by the church, so that means the bikes must be that way.
translation.it: Questi alberi erano accanto alla chiesa, quindi le bici devono essere di là.

translation.en: -Are you real? -We are. We are. We are real.
-But it's all real. -Put down the gun.
-What's going on? -It's OK. We just have to--
Hey, get us the fuck out of here, man. You gotta get us out.
translation.it: Facci uscire da qui. Devi tirarci fuori.

translation.en: There's something in the mist. It killed my dog. You can't let us stay.
translation.it: Qualcosa nella nebbia ha ucciso il mio cane. Non farci restare.

translation.en: And what are you gonna do?
[scoffs] No. What are you gonna do with us?
translation.it: No. Cosa vuoi fare con noi?

translation.en: Whatever's happened will be over soon.
Please. The sheriff thought I was crazy, but I warned them about the mist.
translation.it: Lo sceriffo mi credeva pazzo, ma io li ho avvertiti della nebbia.

translation.en: Don't let her out. She looks unstable. Like she did something bad.
translation.it: Non farla uscire. Lei sembra instabile. Ha fatto qualcosa.

translation.en: And you're never gonna be able to live with yourself, if you leave us behind,
translation.it: E non riuscirai mai a perdonartelo se ci abbandoni,

translation.en: 'cause if you do, we die and you know it.
translation.it: perché se lo fai, moriremo e tu lo sai.

translation.en: Besides, if there's something out there,
translation.it: Inoltre, se là fuori c'è qualcosa,

translation.en: how are you gonna survive taking care of a... scared little freak
translation.it: come sopravvivrai se devi occuparti di un piccolo strambo impaurito

translation.en: And if you don't apologize, I'm gonna tell Kevin you threatened me.
translation.it: Se non chiedi scusa, dirò a Kevin che mi hai minacciato.

translation.en: See you get out of here then.

translation.it: Dopotutto, le palle ce le hai.

translation.en: But I don't take orders from anyone.
translation.it: Ma io non prendo ordini da nessuno.

translation.en: And whatever's out there, you're probably better off
translation.it: Qualunque cosa sia, è meglio che tu esca

translation.en: with a verbally abusive bitch protecting you.
translation.it: con una stronza offensiva che ti protegge.

translation.en: -Mrs Carmody. -You should be ashamed of yourself.
Why? Because I showed them a condom?
Or because I mentioned oral sex?
translation.it: o perché ho parlato di sesso orale?

translation.en: Because you can raise your child any way you want to, and clearly you have,
translation.it: Puoi crescere tua figlia come vuoi, e ovviamente l'hai fatto,

translation.en: but leave my child out of it.
Oh, I'm pretty sure Eric here knows what a blowjob is,
translation.it: Sono certa che Eric sappia cos'è un pompino

translation.en: seeing how I caught him watching porn on his phone the other day.
translation.it: dato che guardava porno dal telefono, l'altro giorno.

translation.en: [woman 1] Have you ever seen this before?
Mom, we need to get inside.
No! Stop! There's something out there!
translation.it: No! Fermi! C'è qualcosa lì fuori!

translation.en: I'm so fed up with you people and your need for attention.
translation.it: Sono stufa di voi, volete attenzione.

translation.en: Said the girl who lied about getting raped.
Do you even know where to point that thing?
That's the way it's gonna be.
Alright. This way. Connor will be waiting outside.
translation.it: Da questa parte. Connor ci sta aspettando fuori.

translation.en: OK. I just wanna go home.
translation.it: Ok. Voglio solo andare a casa.

translation.en: I know, but we're gonna have to wait till we find out what's going on.
translation.it: Lo so, ma aspettiamo di capire che succede.
